title: Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in red ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left: K. 9/30/33; inscribed in graphite, lower right: SCALE  1"=1'0/#/7122 [circled]; inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P; dimensions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for low sideboard. Rounded cabinet at left with circular pull at center of cabinet door. Rectangular right side with three stacked horizontal drawers; pulls on left and right side. Body of sideboard in burled wood (?); left cabinet in wood with vertical grain; top of cabinet in Bakelite (?) or polished material.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933.
September 30, 1933. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-101.
